description:
Deep in the woods of Portland, Oregon a trio of aliens fight to stay alive and one step ahead of Agents Hill and Phelps.  What secrets do these strange visitors from another world hold?  One way or another, the Agents are determined to find out...   

32 PAGES! NO ADS!

32 PAGES!  NO ADS!

name: The Greatest Unit Of Value
description:
The debut novel from author Michael Sadoff!

When Granger Callahan - a man in the midst of a psychotic breakdown - discovers the discarded journal of a hopeless dreamer, it gives his fractured mind the thing it needs most: a sense of purpose and direction.

"Michael Sadoff is an exciting new voice with a veteran writer's sense of the power of words and gift of storytelling." - Robert Inman, author of "Captain Saturday"

"Granger’s condition is sensitively conceived, utterly convincing, even as it provides a profound insight into the so-called reality and sanity of us all.” – Naeem Murr, author of "The Perfect Man"

"Author Michael Sadoff's first book is an electric, thoughtful, mile-a-minute and altogether compelling novel of personal adventure... Unlike most first novels that race from one 'big issue' to another, however, The Greatest Unit of Value holds on to its hat while racing down the road." - John Grooms, "Creative Loafing" book review

$10.00

+ $4.00 domestic shipping

+ $5.00 international shipping

name: Beneath the Shadow of the Arch
description:
A collection of short stories by author Michael O'Brian exploring his life, times, and the people he shared them with in the great city of St. Louis.  

108 pages.  

$10 + $2 shipping
